We're delighted to bring you the latest edition of #EnjoyingBARBUSS, packed with exciting news and valuable insights from the BARBUSS team. This month, we're celebrating strategic leadership promotions that will drive company growth and enhance client results. We also delve into a compelling case study showcasing how our proactive approach and strategic litigation funding secured a 100% recovery for a client whose valuable frozen goods shipment was compromised – turning a potential disaster into a resounding success. Finally, we're proud to announce the successful launch of BARBUSS CAPITAL II, our newest investment vehicle. Read on for all the details!
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/c12832bf-e074-fbd9-3a76-f7c61329e1aa.jpg>

View this email in your browser <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/acEeCBRk0il6oG7SEf8T2mIYy?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>  	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/X7agCDJmnfOvP95fEhlTjywUM?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
We're delighted to bring you the latest edition of #EnjoyingBARBUSS, packed with exciting news and valuable insights from the BARBUSS team. This month, we're celebrating strategic leadership promotions that will drive company growth and enhance client results. We also delve into a compelling case study showcasing how our proactive approach and strategic litigation funding secured a 100% recovery for a client whose valuable frozen goods shipment was compromised – turning a potential disaster into a resounding success. Finally, we're proud to announce the successful launch of BARBUSS CAPITAL II, our newest investment vehicle. Read on for all the details!
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/c12832bf-e074-fbd9-3a76-f7c61329e1aa.jpg> 	

STRATEGIC APPOINTMENTS FOR SUCCESS


We are pleased to announce strategic leadership promotions that will drive company growth and enhance client results. These appointments reflect BARBUSS' commitment to developing its members and fostering exceptional leadership, aligning with its purpose of improving client outcomes through talent development.

We are pleased to announce strategic leadership promotions that will drive company growth and enhance client results. These appointments reflect BARBUSS' commitment to developing its members and fostering exceptional leadership, aligning with its purpose of improving client outcomes through talent development.

*	Martín Brandani, formerly Sr. Account Executive in BARBUSS Uruguay, now leads the Mexican team as a Specialist. This transition underscores BARBUSS's focus on enhancing accountability and leadership, supporting continuous improvement in execution and results. Martín's leadership will be instrumental in strengthening the Mexican team and driving growth.
*	Iben Ramon has been appointed ANR Country Manager. With over six years of dedicated service at BARBUSS, Iben has consistently demonstrated expertise and commitment. His previous role as European Specialist saw him excel in business development across Northern Europe and showcase proficiency in technical claims handling. Iben's leadership will strengthen BARBUSS's value proposition and drive strategic execution to new heights.
*	Carlos Vila Moret will spearhead BARBUSS's expansion into North America as the Director for North & Latin America. This appointment reinforces BARBUSS's strategy of increasing revenue and demonstrates its commitment to developing team members. Carlos's leadership will be crucial in expanding BARBUSS's reach and impact across the Americas.

*	Martín Brandani, formerly Sr. Account Executive in BARBUSS Uruguay, now leads the Mexican team as a Specialist. This transition underscores BARBUSS's focus on enhancing accountability and leadership, supporting continuous improvement in execution and results. Martín's leadership will be instrumental in strengthening the Mexican team and driving growth.
*	Iben Ramon has been appointed ANR Country Manager. With over six years of dedicated service at BARBUSS, Iben has consistently demonstrated expertise and commitment. His previous role as European Specialist saw him excel in business development across Northern Europe and showcase proficiency in technical claims handling. Iben's leadership will strengthen BARBUSS's value proposition and drive strategic execution to new heights.
*	Carlos Vila Moret will spearhead BARBUSS's expansion into North America as the Director for North & Latin America. This appointment reinforces BARBUSS's strategy of increasing revenue and demonstrates its commitment to developing team members. Carlos's leadership will be crucial in expanding BARBUSS's reach and impact across the Americas.

These strategic appointments position BARBUSS for continued success and highlight its dedication to developing top talent while delivering exceptional results for its clients. Congratulation Iben, Martín, and Carlos on their well-deserved promotions and wishing them continued success in their new roles.

Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/d2266e8f-7063-8317-62ce-704972f396f0.jpg>

These strategic appointments position BARBUSS for continued success and highlight its dedication to developing top talent while delivering exceptional results for its clients. Congratulation Iben, Martín, and Carlos on their well-deserved promotions and wishing them continued success in their new roles.

Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/d2266e8f-7063-8317-62ce-704972f396f0.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - GOING THE EXTRA MILE: BARBUSS´s COMMITMENT TO CLIENT CARGO CLAIMS

 
When a valuable shipment of frozen goods was compromised during transit, our client faced a chilling financial loss and a potential business disruption.  The situation looked bleak.  But then, BARBUSS stepped in.
 
This case study reveals how our proactive approach, combined with strategic litigation funding and an unwavering dedication to our client, resulted in a 100% recovery within just six months.
 
Discover how BARBUSS transforms risk into opportunity, turning challenging situations into positive outcomes.  Read the full case study now and learn how we can help you navigate your own business challenges.

Check out the full case here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/y02FCE6noU69P73foiZT7qa5Q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> . <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/jv44CGQpqSLYg71HNsxTBQBg-?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/q9-hCJ7vwfQrXJqH9tGTyM4y2?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/588d1ef3-6f87-9e0c-6bdc-ddbc7c1bee13.jpg>

Check out the full case here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/y02FCE6noU69P73foiZT7qa5Q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> . <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/jv44CGQpqSLYg71HNsxTBQBg-?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/q9-hCJ7vwfQrXJqH9tGTyM4y2?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/588d1ef3-6f87-9e0c-6bdc-ddbc7c1bee13.jpg> 	

INVESTMENT VEHICLE TO CAPITALIZE

INVESTMENT VEHICLE TO CAPITALIZE

 
We are proud to announce the successful launch of BARBUSS CAPITAL II, its latest investment vehicle. This achievement underscores investor confidence in BARBUSS's proven business model, track record, and strategic vision for the future.
 
BARBUSS CAPITAL II will focus on acquiring and financing subrogated claims sourced from BARBUSS's extensive global network of insurance and reinsurance clients. This strategic investment will enable BARBUSS to capitalize on the expanding global claims market and continue delivering exceptional value to its clients.
"We are thrilled to launch BARBUSS CAPITAL II and deeply appreciate the trust our investors have placed in us," said Mauro Arcucci, CEO of BARBUSS. "This fund will empower us to continue identifying and supporting strategic opportunities that align with our core value of Closeness to Clients. “
 
BARBUSS extends its sincere gratitude to its investors for their continued trust and support. With BARBUSS CAPITAL II, the company is well-positioned to drive innovation, broaden its reach, and solidify its leadership position within the risk industry. 
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/dT7LCK5wxUrEJo2cOuvT5HE0q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/ed7b712c-7cb5-dd04-10d6-3609eb2bc26b.gif> 	

TRENDS IN MISAPPROPRIATION FRAUD AND PREVENTION

We are proud to announce the successful launch of BARBUSS CAPITAL II, its latest investment vehicle. This achievement underscores investor confidence in BARBUSS's proven business model, track record, and strategic vision for the future.
 
BARBUSS CAPITAL II will focus on acquiring and financing subrogated claims sourced from BARBUSS's extensive global network of insurance and reinsurance clients. This strategic investment will enable BARBUSS to capitalize on the expanding global claims market and continue delivering exceptional value to its clients.
"We are thrilled to launch BARBUSS CAPITAL II and deeply appreciate the trust our investors have placed in us," said Mauro Arcucci, CEO of BARBUSS. "This fund will empower us to continue identifying and supporting strategic opportunities that align with our core value of Closeness to Clients. “
 
BARBUSS extends its sincere gratitude to its investors for their continued trust and support. With BARBUSS CAPITAL II, the company is well-positioned to drive innovation, broaden its reach, and solidify its leadership position within the risk industry. 
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/dT7LCK5wxUrEJo2cOuvT5HE0q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/ed7b712c-7cb5-dd04-10d6-3609eb2bc26b.gif> 	

TRENDS IN MISAPPROPRIATION FRAUD AND PREVENTION

TRENDS IN MISAPPROPRIATION FRAUD AND PREVENTION

 
At BARBUSS, we are committed to transparency and knowledge sharing. In collaboration with the Marsh Antwerp team, we delved into the latest trends in misappropriation fraud and prevention. Led by our expert, Rens de Visser, this insightful session provided valuable perspectives on tackling financial risks.

We continue to foster discussions that strengthen fraud prevention strategies and industry resilience.
 
Stay tuned for more expert insights!
 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/6f7baec2-2b29-bcd8-9737-1595f13af18f.gif> 	
	
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/xGeDCL5xyUYjvWRt2COTyZW9q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/269614be-7202-6e45-8f4e-4e7d1501447b.jpg> 	

RECORD YEAR FOR THE BA TEAM

We continue to foster discussions that strengthen fraud prevention strategies and industry resilience.
 
Stay tuned for more expert insights!
 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/6f7baec2-2b29-bcd8-9737-1595f13af18f.gif> 	
	
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/xGeDCL5xyUYjvWRt2COTyZW9q?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/269614be-7202-6e45-8f4e-4e7d1501447b.jpg> 	

RECORD YEAR FOR THE BA TEAM

 
Huge congratulations to our exceptional BA team: Tatiana Kazakevich, Javier Garat, Paula Cerullo, Martin Bertello, Luciano Imperio, Pilar Guirat, Rosario Fama, Rosario Arquez, Miguel Fucarille, and Juan Pesado, led by Juan Manuel de la Vega! We are thrilled to celebrate their outstanding achievements in 2024.  They not only met their goals but significantly exceeded all expectations.
 
The team recently enjoyed an inspiring breakfast with Maria Monferini, where they collaboratively set ambitious goals for 2025 and identified innovative strategies to continue their impressive growth trajectory and offer an even wider range of services to our valued clients.
 
We are incredibly excited to see what the BA Team accomplishes in the year ahead!
 
Back to index
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/09d261b8-4a76-b78f-1efb-5876d73ae652.jpg> 	

2025 KICKS OFF WITH ALL-HANDS MEETING

Huge congratulations to our exceptional BA team: Tatiana Kazakevich, Javier Garat, Paula Cerullo, Martin Bertello, Luciano Imperio, Pilar Guirat, Rosario Fama, Rosario Arquez, Miguel Fucarille, and Juan Pesado, led by Juan Manuel de la Vega! We are thrilled to celebrate their outstanding achievements in 2024.  They not only met their goals but significantly exceeded all expectations.
 
The team recently enjoyed an inspiring breakfast with Maria Monferini, where they collaboratively set ambitious goals for 2025 and identified innovative strategies to continue their impressive growth trajectory and offer an even wider range of services to our valued clients.
 
We are incredibly excited to see what the BA Team accomplishes in the year ahead!
 
Back to index
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/09d261b8-4a76-b78f-1efb-5876d73ae652.jpg> 	

2025 KICKS OFF WITH ALL-HANDS MEETING

2025 KICKS OFF WITH ALL-HANDS MEETING


We launched 2025 with our first All-Hands Meeting, where the Finance team reviewed the company's 2024 performance. CEO Mauro Arcucci shared valuable insights and outlined strategic priorities for the year ahead. Exciting talent development initiatives were also announced. The Marketing team showcased remarkable growth metrics for our case studies, highlighting a significant increase in readership, authors, and published case studies in 2024. To celebrate this achievement, we recognized Josefina Reta, Senior Claims Handler, for her most-read case study, "When Precision Weighs More". Check out the full case here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/GyWfCM5yzU6OlrqfDF3T8Yt5B?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> .
 
We have a challenging yet promising year ahead, and we are confident that with our talented team, we will achieve great success.
Back to index
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/c711b3bd-29db-c31c-cd9d-560caa4ba57c.jpg> 	

MEXICO TEAM´S STRONG START


Kicking off the year with a great energy, CEO Mauro Arcucci recently visited the Mexico team!  Martín Brandani, Francisca Muñoz, Martha Arellano, Guadalupe Navarro, Melissa Ivette M., and Nayvy Nava hosted insightful discussions focused on progress, strategies, and teamwork, with a strong emphasis on growth and seizing new opportunities.
 
The results are already evident—positive client feedback, exciting new opportunities, and impactful outcomes are quickly materializing.

Kicking off the year with a great energy, CEO Mauro Arcucci recently visited the Mexico team!  Martín Brandani, Francisca Muñoz, Martha Arellano, Guadalupe Navarro, Melissa Ivette M., and Nayvy Nava hosted insightful discussions focused on progress, strategies, and teamwork, with a strong emphasis on growth and seizing new opportunities.
 
The results are already evident—positive client feedback, exciting new opportunities, and impactful outcomes are quickly materializing.

A huge thank you to our dedicated Mexico team for your hard work and unwavering commitment. Together, we're making a real difference in helping our clients improve their results!
